title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In ink on front: "Designed by S. Kahn, Age 13, Instructor: J. Rohn, Feral Art Projects, The Educational Alliance.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Straight repeat of wheel, sewing machine, cones of thread, and length of fabric printed in green and red (green over red for brown) on white ground.

participants.person_name: The Works Progress Administration, Federal Art Project
